message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you wanting to be fair Alice, but time is money.  Let's close this deal.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'm offering you a better deal than last round. Take it while it's still good!
Alice, my last offer was more than generous. The value keeps decreasing for me -  meet me in the middle.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is a compromise - let's end this before the inflation eats up more of your share.
Alice, we're approaching the halfway point.  My offer is more than fair, let's just get this done.
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. This is my final offer - more than half the original amount is still better than nothing, right?
